tool_description: Validates bathroom fixture dimensions against room constraints and provides standard clearance requirements for safe and functional installation.

toilet_type.description: Toilet style: standard, compact, wall-mounted, or corner

shower_type.description: Shower configuration: corner, alcove, walk-in, or tub-shower-combo

shower_dimensions.description: Shower length and width in inches [length, width]

error_messages: Invalid toilet type: Use standard, compact, wall-mounted, or corner.
Invalid vanity width: Vanity width must be between 18 and 72 inches.
Invalid shower type: Use corner, alcove, walk-in, or tub-shower-combo.
Invalid shower dimensions: Provide exactly two dimensions [length, width] between 24 and 96 inches each.
usage: Specify fixture types and dimensions. The tool validates each fixture meets minimum size requirements and provides clearance specifications.

vanity_clearance.description: Required clearance in front of vanity in inches

shower_clearance.description: Required clearance at shower entrance in inches

fixture_validation_status.description: Overall validation result: valid, warning, or invalid

validation_notes.description: Specific validation messages for each fixture
